column2: "EWURADZE asɛm a ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia hɔ wɔ amanaman ho:"
"Egypt dze: wɔ Egypthen Farao Neko no dɔm a wɔwɔ esutsen Eufrates ho wɔ Karkemis a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar bɔɔ no wɔ Josia ba Jehoiakim
column3: Judahen no
column4: n'afe a otsia anan no mu no ho."

column3: na hom ntwe mbɛn akono."
na hom ntsenatsena do! Hom nsoa hom dadzekyɛw ngyinagyina hɔ; hom mpɔw hom mpeaa no ho

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na muhu dɛ hɔn bo etutu yi? Wɔadan hɔn ekyir; wɔabɔ hɔn akatakyi no egu
column3: na woeguan ntsɛntsɛm. Wommbu hɔn kɔn ekyir: hu wɔ mbea nyina
eso ɔkatakyi mmfi nsa; kwaamu afamu esutsen Eufrates ho na woefintsiw na wɔahwehwe ase."

column2: "Woana na ɔasoɛr noho yi dɛ Nael a n'esu bu asorɛkye begyabegya dɛ nsutsen yi?"

column3: dɛ nsutsen a n'esu rubu asorɛkye begyabegya: na ɔse
column5: mebɛkata asaase no do; mebɛsɛɛ kurow no na no mu mba no."

column3: hom mbɔ mfa mu; na ntseaseanam e
column4: hom mbɔ kyirdidi! Hom mma akatakyi mfir edzi: Kus na Put a wokurakura kyɛm; na Ludfo a wokurakura egyen

column3: dɔm EWURADZE
column6: ama oeedzi n'atamfo wer: na afona bedzidzi amee
column7: na ɔanom hɔn bɔgyaa ɔabow: na EWURADZE
column9: wɔ okum afɔr bi wɔ kwaa mu asaase do wɔ esutsen Eufrates ho."

column3: fow kɔ Gilead kɛgye edur! Eyɛ edur pii kwa; ɔyarsa biara nnyi hɔ ma wo."
na wo nkekamu ahyɛ asaase ma tɔ: na ɔkatakyi asoasoa ɔkatakyi do
column4: hɔn beenu no abɔ mu ahwe ase."

column2: "Asɛm a EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia
column3: mbrɛ Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar bɛba abɔbɔ Egypt asaase no."
na hom mfa ntahye Migidɔl
column4: hom ntahye no Nof na Tapanhes: hom nka dɛ
column6: na siesie woho; na afona no bedzidzi etwa wo ho ehyia."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na w'ahoɔdzenfo wɔapra hɔn kɔ yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na w'anantwi enngyina? Osiandɛ EWURADZE paam hɔn kɔree."

column3: nyew
column4: wɔhwehwee ase dedaa hɔnho do: na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Hom nsoɛr ma yɛnsan nkɔ hɛn nkorɔfo
column6: na hɛn awobea no do hɔ
column7: mfi afona a ɔrehyɛ hɛn no ano."

column3: Egypthen Farao yɛ dede ara kwa; ɔama hyɛber no etwa mu asen."
Ɔhen a ne dzin dze dɔm EWURADZE no na ɔse
column4: ampaara mbrɛ Tabor tse wɔ mbepɔw mu
column5: na mbrɛ Karmel tse wɔ po ho no

column3: siesie woho kɔ ndɔmmum mu: na Nof bɛdan amamfo

column2: "Egypt yɛ ɔnantwiber a no ho yɛ fɛw; na ɔsɛɛ fi kwaamu afamu aba no do."
"N'apaafo so a wɔtse no mu no
column3: wɔtse dɛ nantwibuw mu anantwimba; na hɔn so wɔadandan hɔnho na wɔabɔ mu eguanguan

column2: "Ne ndze bɛgyegye dɛ ɔwɔ dze; osiandɛ n'atamfo nam reba
column3: na wɔdze nkuma aba no do
EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: naaso worunntum nnhwehwɛ mu; osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ so sen mbɛbɛw
column5: na wɔkan hɔn dodow a ɔnnyɛ."

column2: "Wɔbɛma Egypt babaa n'enyi ato; wobeyi no ahyɛ kwaa mu ɔman no nsa."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: ɔse dɛ: Hwɛ mebɛtsea Amon a ɔwɔ No
column7: na n'ahemfo; mekyerɛ Farao na hɔn a wɔtwer no no:"

column2: "na mibeyi hɔn mahyɛ hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ hɔn nkwa no nsa
column3: na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar nsa
column4: na n'akowaa nsa: na n'ekyir no wɔbɛtsena do dɛ tsetse nda no

column3: mma nnsuro
column8: na w'asefo efi ndɔmmum asaase do: na Jakob bɛsan

column3: mma nnsuro
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; na mowɔ wo nkyɛn: na mebɛma amanaman a mabɔ hɔn apetse do no woewie sa
column6: meremma innwie sa; na mbom mebɛtsea wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata
column7: na meremma emmfa woho tɔtrɔtɔ ara da."
